opendial.domains.rules.effects

Class BasicEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.domains.rules.effects.BasicEffect

  • public class BasicEffect
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a basic effect of a rule. A basic effect is formally defined as a triple with:
    1. a (possibly underspecified) variable label;
    2. one of four basic operations on the variable SET, DISCARD, ADD, REMOVE;
    3. a (possibly underspecified) variable value;
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-20 21:16:08 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
